summary: This mod will test even the toughest Dragonborn. Battle your way through ten waves of the undead for a powerful reward. Do you have what it takes?
descriptionHtml:
With Halloween coming around, this is the perfect quest for your Dragonborn. You will face skeletons, Draugr, Werewolves, and ghosts. Each wave of monsters will progressively get harder. At the end of it, you will be rewarded with a powerful (but not overpowered) weapon of you choice.

I personally have yet to beat this mod.

[size=4]Do not use this mod with a new start![/size]
This mod will begin [b]automatically[/b] once you load your game. You will have zombies and skeletons attack you at Helgen, poor defenseless you...

[size=4]Where to go to start mod?[/size]
Anywhere!
You have one minute to get to a suitable location. After one minute the attack will begin, [b]wherever you are[/b]. So probably go to some open location, as opposed to a city.

You will face ten waves of undead monsters with increasing difficulty, for a powerful reward. Good luck.

[youtube]GGyqbVRPbkY[/youtube]
Don't be put off by this wave (6) , I've made it easier since then. Not all of them are that hard.
author: DRain64
